# Inspired by Fear (Feat)
## Overview
When spreading fear to your enemies, you further embolden your allies.

**Prerequisite**: Ability to perform dirge of doom.

**Benefit**: Allies in the area of your dirge of doom receive a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear effects. At least one enemy must be in the dirgeâ€™s area and become [[Shaken|shaken]] by the dirge for you and your allies to receive this bonus.

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 151
